item.title: 2 Facts You Need To Accept For A Happy Marriage — By A Psychologist
item.description: If you want a healthy marriage, there’s two things you’ll have to learn first. Accept them for better, or resent them for worse.

item.title: LG Exec, Capgemini Study Lay Out Reasons EV Adoption Stuck In Neutral
